review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: Taking time to practice a relaxation or meditation every day heals, restores and
  maintains optimal self-regulation. This puts you on The Path.
quote: "Mental illness can be referred to with one word, rigidity" Heard said by Milton Erickson

step_of_the_day.title:
Hold the intention to be more flexible today. You can be physically flexible, mentally flexible, emotionally
  flexible and you can be flexible in your overall approach to life. Flexibility is a sign of health (Pillar
  #8)
step_of_the_day.content:
The other day as I was walking on a broken-up sidewalk, my foot landed where the pavement was separated. My
  foot started to twist where there was no sidewalk underneath. I had an immediate and automatic adjustment to
  shift my weight and avoid stress on my ankle that could have resulted in injury. It was an example of how
  physical flexibility contributed to my resilience.When you keep trying to solve a problem in the same way, with the same thinking pattern or framework, you
  will keep getting the same result. This is where it's important to be able to "think outside the box". And
  it's also a problem when you get stuck in an emotional holding pattern.

action_step: Write about ways that you tend to be rigid and any intention to become more flexible.
journal_entry: Write about how successful you are in your efficient use of your energy.
